WELCOME_SUBTITLE: Hunhea is a collection of 10000 hear lollipops, randomly generated from over 250 hand drawn traits.
ABOUT_SUBTITLE: HUNHEA was born from a university project for an important bank. Which involves the construction of an imposing sculpture to crown a large redevelopment. Bringing HUNHEA into digital, especially in the NFTs world, has been a great satisfaction, and we work every day to bring forward something really great. We can therefore say that we offer real sculptures, given that one (in reference to the sculpture of the project) will be the mirror of the other (in reference to our nfts) only in the digital world. The “HUNHEARTs” are “Lollipops”, partly different but all special, one of a kind and collectible. We would like to clarify that all our members will boast of great benefits based on meritocratic and not necessarily economic principles. And that there will be some surprises during the course of this beautiful adventure, because we want to make HUNHEA a STATUS SYMBOL.
HOWTOBUY_SUBTITLE: Here are the steps on what you need to do to get HUNHEARTS.
HOWTOBUY_LIST_1: Download the metamask.io extension on your browser.
HOWTOBUY_LIST_2: Buy Ethereum from various exchanges, such as Coinbase or Binance
HOWTOBUY_LIST_3: Send Ethereum to your MetaMask wallet.
HOWTOBUY_LIST_4: Otherwise you can proceed by adding funds from within the MetaMask itself or to the one from your other extensions (plugins).
HOWTOBUY_LIST_5: Link your wallet to our website.
HOWTOBUY_LIST_6: Confirm the transaction and any associated fees.
HOWTOBUY_LIST_7: Once you make the purchase, your HUNHEART you can choose in your wallet and on OpenSea! Advice for the visitor: If you do not want to spend money on gas and tax inconveniences through the classic platforms you can proceed with the purchase by connecting your wallet and clicking on the “MINT” button “saving gas”.
FIRST_ROADMAP_1_DESCRIPTIONS: WHITE T-shirt One size fits all HUNHEA Limited Edition to the first 50 who buy HUNHEA NFTs.
FIRST_ROADMAP_2_DESCRIPTIONS: FOR THOSE WHO BUY MORE NFT FIRST COLLECTION (100 HEARTS) A THIRD GENERATION 3D GIF NFT FREE OF CHARGE delivered after the launch phase of the future collection.
FIRST_ROADMAP_3_DESCRIPTIONS: The first one who buys will have a FREE 2D, “SECOND GENERATION” NFT issued after the launch phase of the future collection.
FIRST_ROADMAP_4_DESCRIPTIONS: The second who buys a 20% discount on the NFT chosen (excluding gas fees). With reimbursement in 1/2 working days in the personal WALLET.
FIRST_ROADMAP_5_DESCRIPTIONS: The third party who purchases a 10% discount on the NFT chosen (excluding gas taxes). With reimbursement in 1/2 working days in the personal WALLET.
FIRST_ROADMAP_6_DESCRIPTIONS: The third party who purchases a 10% discount on the NFT chosen (excluding gas taxes). With reimbursement in 1/2 working days in the personal WALLET.
SECOND_ROADMAP_1_DESCRIPTIONS: For those who believed in us, holder of at least X1 Nft HUNHEARTs “The first generation” to become a member and take part in future projects such as that of the fourth generation HUNHEA. By paying a membership fee soon established, this, after the launch phase of HUNHEA FLAGs “The second Generation”.
SECOND_ROADMAP_2_DESCRIPTIONS: Whoever buys more Nfts HUNHEA FLAGs will have the chance to win a brand new supercar. This, after the launch phase of HUNHEA FLAGs “The second Generation”.
SECOND_ROADMAP_3_DESCRIPTIONS: Random draw to participate in the Modball Rally as a valid guest for a single person and meet the creator of the HUNHEA project. This, after the launch phase of HUNHEA FLAGs “The second Generation”.
SECOND_ROADMAP_4_DESCRIPTIONS: Random Extract X100 Pairs of HUNHEA Limited Edition Designer Shoes (NFTs Version). This, after the launch phase of HUNHEA FLAGs “The second Generation”.
SECOND_ROADMAP_5_DESCRIPTIONS: Random Extraction X500 HUNHEA Limited Edition Signature T-Shirts (NFTs Version). This, after the launch phase of HUNHEA FLAGs “The second Generation”.
SECOND_ROADMAP_6_DESCRIPTIONS: The first X1000s who will purchase a 30% discount on the chosen NFT (excluding gas fees). With refund in 7/14 working days in the personal WALLET. This, after the launch phase of HUNHEA FLAGs “The second Generation”.
SECOND_ROADMAP_7_DESCRIPTIONS: The last X500 who will purchase a 15% discount on the chosen NFT (excluding gas fees). With refund in 7/14 working days in the personal WALLET. This, after the launch phase of HUNHEA FLAGs “The second Generation”.
